Implement the new API (#143)

* Implement the new API

This API aims to simplify usage and fix bugs (such as random_init being
set wrong) by removing as many arguments as possible from the API.

In the process, it makes using metaworld potentially much more
efficient.

However, this changes breaks the old API.

Prevent goal from being resampled on reset

Note that this *should* make the environments easier, since they're no
longer partially observable in a non-meta-learning sense.

* Unsplit ReachPushPickPlace*

* Undo special goal fixes (not needed)

* Delete old API

* "Fix" mouse_control.py

* Update the README

* Integration tests for benchmarks

* Rename env_id -> env_name

* Add tests for checking observations and spaces

* Extend all observation spaces to 12 elements

Co-authored-by: Avnish Narayan <avnishna@usc.edu>

Rename CI workflow and fix addopts typo (#316)

Add benchmark seeding (#341)

* Add Procedural Generation of GoalHidden Envs

The new environments are children of the various Metaworld tasks, but with the goal zeroed out in observations and goal randomization turned off. All envs have the new name Parent + GoalHidden.

* Add Test For Goal Hidden Envs

Test checks for all obs being zeroed out, all envs can be created and stepped through, goal does not change on reset, and the name contains important key words

* Add single goal environments

Add single goal environments with goal observable and goal hidden
constructors.

* Add option to seed benchmark

* Rename cls to env in single goal env constructors

Co-authored-by: Adithya Bellathur <bellathu@usc.edu>
